game.name: Wonderful Everyday Down the Rabbit-Hole
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Wonderful Everyday is a visual novel with multiple routes which develops a story based on a few concepts: "the sky and the world", "the beginning and the end", "literature and science", "savior and hero", "brother and sister".
game.shortDescriptionEn: Wonderful Everyday is a visual novel with multiple routes which develops a story based on a few concepts: "the sky and the world", "the beginning and the end", "literature and science", "savior and hero", "brother and sister".

reviewHighlights.text: The best way to larp and jerk off
Got Absolute Chills When Chris Chan [i] Nutted Inside A Desk; Said It's My Own Invention And Returned To The Sky [/i]
